member.name: T:Interop.Libraries
member.summary: The Wrapper class for maintaining names of dependent native libraries.

member.name: T:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncOption
member.summary: Enumeration for the sync option.

member.name: F:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncOption.None
member.summary: The sync job will be operated normally.

member.name: F:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncOption.Expedited
member.summary: The sync job will be operated as soon as possible.

member.name: F:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncOption.NoRetry
member.summary: The sync job will not be performed again when it fails.

member.name: T:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncPeriod
member.summary: Enumeration for the sync period.

member.name: F:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncPeriod.ThirtyMin
member.summary: Sync within 30 minutes.

member.name: F:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncPeriod.OneHour
member.summary: Sync within 1 hour.

member.name: F:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncPeriod.TwoHours
member.summary: Sync within 2 hours.

member.name: F:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncPeriod.ThreeHours
member.summary: Sync within 3 hours.

member.name: F:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncPeriod.SixHours
member.summary: Sync within 6 hours.

member.name: F:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncPeriod.TwelveHours
member.summary: Sync within 12 hours.

member.name: F:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncPeriod.OneDay
member.summary: Sync within 1 day.

member.name: T:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncAdapter
member.summary: This class contains the delegates to be called upon scheduling a sync operation.

member.name: T:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncAdapter.StartSyncCallback
member.summary: The callback function for the sync adapter's start sync request.
member.param: The sync job parameters corresponding to the sync request.
member.returns: true if the sync operation is success, @c false otherwise.

member.name: T:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncAdapter.CancelSyncCallback
member.summary: The callback function for the sync adapter's cancel sync request.
member.param: The sync job parameters corresponding to the sync request.

member.name: M:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncAdapter.SetSyncEventCallbacks(Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncAdapter.StartSyncCallback,Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncAdapter.CancelSyncCallback)
member.summary: Sets the client (sync adapter) callback functions.
member.param: A callback function to be called by the sync manager for performing the sync operation.
A callback function to be called by the sync manager for cancelling the sync operation.
member.exception: Thrown when any of the arguments are null.
Thrown when the application calling this API cannot be a sync adapter.

member.name: M:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncAdapter.UnsetSyncEventCallbacks
member.summary: Unsets the client (sync adapter) callback functions.
member.exception: Thrown when sync manager internal error occurs.

member.name: T:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncClient
member.summary: The SyncClient APIs for managing the sync operations. Applications will call these APIs to schedule their sync operations. The sync service maintains sync requests from all the applications and invokes their respective callback methods to perform account synchronization operations.

member.name: M:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncClient.#cctor
member.summary: The constructor.

member.name: M:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncClient.RequestOnDemandSyncJob(Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncJobData,Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncOption)
member.summary: Requests the sync manager to perform one time sync operation.
member.param: The sync job information of the sync job request.
Sync options determine a way to operate the sync job and can be used as ORing.
member.exception: Thrown when any of the arugments are null.
Thrown when the application calling this API doesn't have a sync adapter.
member.returns: An unique value which can manage sync jobs. The number of sync job ID is limite as it is less than hundred.

member.name: M:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncClient.AddPeriodicSyncJob(Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncJobData,Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncPeriod,Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncOption)
member.summary: Requests the sync manager to perform periodic sync operations.
member.param: The sync job information of the sync job request.
Determines the time interval of the periodic sync. The periodic sync operation can be triggered in that interval, but it does not guarantee the exact time. The minimum value is 30 minutes.
Sync options determine a way to operate the sync job and can be used as ORing.
member.exception: In case of a privilege not defined.
Thrown when any of the arguments are null.
Thrown when the application calling this API doesn't have a sync adapter.
member.returns: A unique value which can manage sync jobs. The number of sync job IDs is limited as it is less than hundred.

member.name: M:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncClient.AddDataChangeSyncJob(Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncJobData,Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncOption)
member.summary: Requests the sync manager to perform sync operations whenever the corresponding DB is changed.
member.param: The sync job information of the sync job request.
Sync options determine a way to operate the sync job and can be used as ORing.
member.exception: In case of a privilege is not defined.
Thrown when any of the arguments are null.
Thrown when the application calling this API doesn't have a sync adapter.
member.returns: A unique value which can manage sync jobs. The number of sync job IDs is limited as it is less than hundred.

member.name: M:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncClient.GetAllSyncJobs
member.summary: Gets all the sync jobs registered with the sync manager.
member.returns: Returns the list of SyncJobData corresponding to sync requests.

member.name: M:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncClient.RemoveSyncJob(System.Int32)
member.summary: Requests the sync manager to remove the corresponding sync job based on the ID.
member.param: A unique value of each sync job, it can be used to search a specific sync job and remove it.
member.exception: Thrown if the input arugments is invalid.

member.name: T:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncJobData
member.summary: This class represents information about the sync job request.

member.name: F:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncJobData.CalendarCapability
member.summary: Represents the calendar capability.
member.remarks: If you want to receive notification about the calendar database change, assign it to the SyncJobName property of the SyncJobData object.

member.name: F:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncJobData.ContactCapability
member.summary: Represents the contact capability.
member.remarks: If you want to receive notification about the contact database change, assign it to the SyncJobName property of the SyncJobData object.

member.name: F:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncJobData.ImageCapability
member.summary: Represents the image capability.
member.remarks: If you want to receive notification about the image database change, assign it to the SyncJobName property of the SyncJobData object.

member.name: F:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncJobData.VideoCapability
member.summary: Represents the video capability.
member.remarks: If you want to receive notification about the video database change, assign it to the SyncJobName property of the SyncJobData object.

member.name: F:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncJobData.SoundCapability
member.summary: Represents the sound capability.
member.remarks: If you want to receive notification about the sound database change, assign it to the SyncJobName property of the SyncJobData object.

member.name: F:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncJobData.MusicCapability
member.summary: Represents the music capability.
member.remarks: If you want to receive notification about the music database change, assign it to the SyncJobName property of the SyncJobData object.

member.name: P:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncJobData.Account
member.summary: The account instance on which the sync operation was requested or @c null in the case of the accountless sync operation.

member.name: P:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncJobData.UserData
member.summary: User data which contains an additional information related to the registered sync job.

member.name: P:Tizen.Account.SyncManager.SyncJobData.SyncJobName
member.summary: A string representing a sync job which has been operated or capability setting to operate the data change sync job.
